Name: International Medical Station
About the game: International Medical Station As a sequel to the applications made by Planet Muses, International Medical Station provides information about drugs corresponding to the diseases. As you click through the organs or letters, diseases and assorted drugs appear on the left side of the screen. As you click on a drug, information about the drug appears. Cycle through all parts or parts of interest to find the drugs related to each part! ~1300 drugs - ~33000 information (paragraphs and info pieces) - ~7000 information actually used With an ambitious goal ahead, the station seeks to contribute to the well-being of everyone. Updates will be constantly made and published.
